articles.title: Why Suriya is easily the most versatile leading man in Indian cinema today - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suriya is a star, a hero, a villain, and also a National Award-winner. In an industry that has almost always demarcated the stars from the actors, Suriya Sivakumar has dared to walk this thin line and done it well.
